member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the renderer uses the application state to determine rendering style.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer.DrawEnhanceGroupBox(Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.GroupBox,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.String,System.Drawing.Font,System.Drawing.Color,System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags,Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.EnhanceGroupBoxState)
member.summary: Draws a group box control in the specified state and bounds, with the specified groupbox, graphics, bounds, text, font, textcolor, text format flags, and state.
member.param: GroupBox object
The Graphics used to draw the group box.
The Rectangle that specifies the bounds of the group box.
The String to draw with the group box.
The Font to apply to groupBoxText.
The Color to apply to groupBoxText.
A bitwise combination of the TextFormatFlags values.
One of the EnhanceGroupBoxState values that specifies the visual state of the group box.

member.summary: Fills a rounded rectangle with specified parameters.
